CVE_data_meta.TITLE: PAN-OS: GlobalProtect Portal PHP session fixation vulnerability

description_data.value: The GlobalProtect Portal feature in PAN-OS does not set a new session identifier after a successful user login, which allows session fixation attacks, if an attacker is able to control a user's session ID.

work_around.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.

solution.value:
This issue is fixed in PAN-OS 8.1.14, PAN-OS 9.0.8, PAN-OS 9.1.0, and all later PAN-OS versions.

PAN-OS 8.0 is now end-of-life as of October 31, 2019, and is no longer covered by our Product Security Assurance policies.

PAN-OS 7.1 is on extended support until June 30, 2020, and is only being considered for critical security vulnerability fixes.

credit.value: This issue was found by a customer.
